Room.Name: Large Ocean Going Raft
Room.ShortDescription: You are aboard a very large and comfortable raft.
Room.LongDescription: There seems to be crates of fruit and large kegs of beer and other spirits stored here. There are a number of hammocks strung below the canvas sun- shade which look quite inviting. The tranquil sounds of the water lapping against the side and the smell of the sea air may help you to relax after your long swim.
